record.title: CREATING LONG-TERM ENERGY ALTERNATIVES FOR THE NATION ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now move to proceed to H.R. 6, and I send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I withdraw my motion to proceed.
Mr. President, I had alerted the distinguished Republican leader I was going to do this. I had to do it because we had to do it before the night's business ends.
